Let $ a_1, a_2, ...$ be a sequence for which \[a_1 = 2\,\hspace{.2in}a_2 = 3\, \hspace{.2in}\text{and}\hspace{.2in}a_n = \frac {a_{n - 1}}{a_{n - 2}} \text{ for each positive integer } n \ge 3.\]What is $ a_{2006}$?\\
\\
$\textbf{(A) } \frac 12 \qquad \textbf{(B) } \frac 23 \qquad \textbf{(C) } \frac 32 \qquad \textbf{(D) } 2 \qquad \textbf{(E) } 3$
